post: I miss how things used to be

post: I don’t want to get out of bed
comment: That sounds heavy. Taking small steps today might help a bit.
You matter more than you realize. Your feelings are valid.
That’s okay — motivation comes and goes. Be gentle with yourself.
Everyone does. What matters is that you’re trying.
I’m really sorry you feel that way. You deserve care and support.
That can be tough. Sometimes numbness is how our mind protects us.
It’s normal to feel afraid. You don’t have to face it all at once.
That sounds frustrating. Maybe taking short breaks could help.
I’m sorry you’re feeling that way. You still have worth and value.
